text: Ate tusim kitaba vali'am (yahudi'am ate isa'i'am) nala taraka vitaraka na karom. Paratu usa dhaga nala karo jihara yoga hai. Para jihare unham vicom be-inasaphi hana, uha nahim mananage. Ate akho, ki asim usa ciza te imana li'a'e, jihari sade vala bheji ga'i hai. Ate usa vala jihari tuhade vala bheji ga'i hai. Sada upasaka ate tahada upasaka ika hi hai. Ate asim usa di hi agi'a da palana karana vale ham
